name: Elusive Glow
description:
Time to help this world and start moving after the elusive glow. Play for the most unstable characters in this universe and try not to forget who you really are. Collect energy for alpha and beta decay
and avoid collisions with other particles. Controls: A & D or Left & Right Arrows
+ mouse for the main menu.

Update: PostJam Elusive Glow v. 1.1 with a few changes
